data.message: I wish you good days I will not be in hell because Allah is a very serious short world life Allah promises everlasting life Before the prophet Jesus was a prophet Moses you do not believe in him because Jesus came after him okay I do not say anything okay Prophet of Allah is the Messenger of Allah We believe in all the prophets, but we are the last prophet Muhammad Ummah because in that space man is the last prophet of Allah goodness in our religion goodness I am inviting you to listen to Islam but I am the only one who invited me I did not change as the bible, I made you immerse in Allaha who created an entity that can think of food that knows how to speak in space.
